description: This object contains information that is used to control if a submission could be cancelled.
name: CancelControl

submissionId.description: The unique, immutable Synapse ID of the Submission.

userId.description: The ID of the user who submitted this Submission.

canCancel.description: Can this submission be cancelled? By default, this will be set to False. Users can read this value. Only the queue's scoring application can change this value.

cancelRequested.description: Has user requested to cancel this submission? By default, this will be set to False. Submission owner can read and request to change this value. The queue's scoring application can only read this value.
